description: A Gear Second technique where Luffy stretches both arms back and launches a powerful double-palm strike with enhanced speed and power from his accelerated blood flow.
firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique against Minotaurus on Level 3 of Impel Down, sending the massive Jailer Beast flying up the stairs.

description: A powerful kick technique used by Bentham (Bon Clay) that delivers tremendous force to the opponent. Part of his ballet-based martial arts style called Okama Kenpo.
firstUseContext: Bentham uses this technique as part of the coordinated attack against Minotaurus on Level 3 of Impel Down.

name.japanese: ゴムゴムの鎚ライフル

description: A combination attack where Galdino coats Luffy's arm with hardened wax, creating a massive mallet effect. Luffy then uses his Gomu Gomu no Rifle technique with the wax coating, dramatically increasing the attack's impact.
firstUseContext: Created on the spot as a finishing move against Minotaurus. This combination attack, combined with Bentham's kick, finally defeated the Jailer Beast on Level 3 of Impel Down.
requirements: Galdino's Doru Doru no Mi wax coating
